data.quote: No one can defeat a powerful mind.
data.author: Chanakya

data.quote: The biggest gurumantra is never share your secrets with anybody. It will destroy you.
data.author: Chanakya

data.quote: Even if a snake is not poisonous, it should pretend to be venomous.
data.author: Chanakya

data.quote: Before you start some work always ask yourselves three questions why I am doing it, what the results might be and will I be successful. Only when you think deeply and find satisfactory answers to these questions, go ahead.
data.author: Chanakya

data.quote: He who is overly attached to his family members, experiences fear and sorrow, for the root of all grief is attachment. Thus one should discard attachment to be happy.
data.author: Chanakya

data.quote: A man is great by deeds, not by birth.
data.author: Chanakya

data.quote: Humbleness is at the root of self control.
data.author: Chanakya

data.quote: Education is the best friend. An educated person is respected everywhere. Education beats the beauty and the youth.
data.author: Chanakya

data.quote: Test a servant while in the discharge of his duty, a relative difficulty, a friend in adversity, and a wife is misfortune.
data.author: Chanakya

data.quote: As soon as the fear approaches near, attack and destroy it.
data.author: Chanakya

data.quote: God is not present in idols. Your feelings are your God. The soul is your temple.
data.author: Chanakya

data.quote: Wealth, a friend, a wife, and a kingdom may be regained, but this body when lost may never be acquired again.
data.author: Chanakya

data.quote: Books are as useful to a stupid person as a mirror is useful to a blind person.
data.author: Chanakya

data.quote: Treat your kid like a darling for the first five years. For the next five years, scold them. By the time they turn sixteen, treat them like a friend. Your grown up children are your best friends.
data.author: Chanakya

data.quote: The one excellent thing that can be learned from a lion is that whatever a man intends doing should be done by him with a wholehearten and strenuous effort.
data.author: Chanakya

data.quote: As a single withered tree, if set aflame, causes a whole forest to burn, so does a rascal son destroy a whole family.
data.author: Chanakya

data.quote: There is poison in the fang of the serpent, in the mouth of the fly and in the sting of a scorpion but the wicked man is saturated with it.
data.author: Chanakya

data.quote: Purity of speech, of the mind, of the senses, and of a compassionate heart are needed by one who desires to rise to the divine platform.
data.author: Chanakya

data.quote: Drop the idea that attachment and love are one thing. They are enemies. It is attachment that destroys all love.
data.author: Chanakya

data.quote: We should not fret for what is past, nor should we be anxious about the future men of discernment deal only with the present moment.
data.author: Chanakya
